snippet: The dominant flu strain this year is not very vulnerable to the vaccine and the agency is urging anyone with flu symptoms to take antiviral medicines.
lead_paragraph: The dominant flu strain this year is not very vulnerable to the vaccine and the agency is urging anyone with flu symptoms to take antiviral medicines.

headline.main: A Bad Flu Season Hits the Halfway Mark, C.D.C. Says

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
